archimate:DataObject.name: Public Profile
archimate:DataObject.documentation: In Sovrin Infrastructure, a Public Profile is a set of Attributes describing a Sovrin Entity, including its Legal Identity, logo(s) or other trademarks, location(s), marketing information, web links, and any other information that may be required by the Sovrin Governance Framework or a Domain-Specific Governance Framework in order to ensure transparency and accountability.
